title: Botanicals Design
description: This website was originally in WordPress, and I instead switch the tech stack to use React, specifically Gatsby for Static Site Generation. It is a very image-heavy site, so I utilized many responsive image techniques.

title: Avarice Sheets
description: This is an application I have been working on for quite a while. It uses a Node/Express backend REST API and a MongoDB database, and a React front end. I am currently working on hooking up the React front end to the backend. More information is available on my GitHub repo.

title: AvariceGame.com
description: I just recently started this, it is currently a shell but is currently in progress to be a large-scale server-side rendered website (with NextJS) and also include a User Dashboard.
